contentrichtext.text: {{italictitle}} {{For|other uses|Zúñiga (disambiguation)}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Zuniga'' | image = | image_caption = | image_width = 250px | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Arthropoda]] | classis = [[Arachnida]] | ordo = [[Spider|Araneae]] | familia = [[Salticidae]] | subfamilia = [[Synemosyninae]] | genus = '''''Zuniga''''' | genus_authority = [[George and Elizabeth Peckham|Peckham & Peckham]], 1892 | diversity_link = List of Salticidae species#Zuniga | diversity = 2 species | type_species = ''[[Zuniga laeta|Sarinda laeta]]'' | type_species_authority = Peckham & Peckham, 1892 | range_map = | range_map_width = 250px | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = see text }} '''''Zuniga''''' is a [[spider]] [[genus (biology)|genus]] of the [[Salticidae]] family (jumping spiders). ==Species== * ''[[Zuniga laeta]]'' <small>(Peckham & Peckham, 1892)</small> — [[Brazil]] * ''[[Zuniga magna]]'' <small>Peckham & Peckham, 1892</small> — [[Panama]] to Brazil ==References== * {{Aut|Platnick, Norman I.}} (2007): [http://research.amnh.org/entomology/spiders/catalog/index.html The world spider catalog], version 8.0. ''American Museum of Natural History''. {{DEFAULTSORT:Zuniga (Genus)}} [[Category:Salticidae]] {{Salticidae-stub}}
